title: If eating insects are haram, is food touched by flies najis or haram to eat? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Maham from Pakistan Assalamu Alaikum Alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullah Insects are prohibited to eat either because it is something that is disgusting to humans in general or due to the fact that it may be harmful medically. May Allah protect us. Anyhow, buying insects is totally prohibited in Islam because it has no use and eating it is prohibited if as stated before.
